About me

Hi, I'm Matt, a photographer from Wakefield, West Yorkshire. My passion is photography, capturing special moments, beautiful scenery or just candid images of life going by, I love to document and record these periods of time.

I enjoy all aspects of photography from landscape to wedding photography.

Having spent the last decade working on my technique, building confidence and having some amazing opportunies to build my skills, I now feel it's right to demonstrate the quality of my work and share with the public.

Please feel free to browse my portfolios and of course contact me if you wish to enquire about my photography services.
